title: NgRx Root State Management Options Schema

___skipPackageJson.description: Do not add @ngrx/store as dependency to package.json (e.g., --skipPackageJson).

___minimal.description: Setup state management without registering initial reducers.

___module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

___stateInterface.description: Specifies the interface for the state.

___path.description: The path to create the state.
